column2:
**gln** - string (13); the GLN number of the organization that is associated with the authorized user of the EDIN 2.0 platform at the account level;
OR
**guid** - string; unique identifier of the organization at EDIN 2.0 platform

**doc_uuid** - string; document UUID

**type** - numeric; document status

* 0 - positive (accepted)
* 1 - negative (rejected)
The body of the method request may contain free text (the reason for refusal / cancellation)
